title: Design Inspiration
content:
Hi guys, as you prolly guessed im new here, i tried to use the search bar about this but its got a big fat beta tag on it, so if anyone can redirect me to another thread I would be very greatful.  
Anyway to the point, I stumbled accross this forum whilst on a research mission, I’m not really struggling (at the moment) with inspiration but more I’m interested to see what kind of things that you guys do for inspiration and how you hone down your design processes. I know that certain studios have like ‘chill out areas’ and things so you can go and think or be inspired and what not. So I beg the question… What sort of things do you guys use/had/have/need…etc. for inspiration?  
Cheers =P
author: Stugoo
